name: Double Bricks CARS
description:
Got bored while waiting in a boutique for your girlfriend?
Got bored while waiting in an Apple shop for your boyfriend?
Got bored while waiting in a supermarket for your parents?
Loving cars and/or LEGO® bricks?

If just one answer is "yes", this is the perfect app for you!

Keep the cars in your memory and try to find the couples whithin least tries.

- 35+ smashing Miniland scaled cars!
- 100% hand made of LEGO® bricks!
- Retina HD images for iPad Pro/iPhone Plus!
- 1, or 2 Player at one single device!
- 4 different levels:
from "could be played with one eye closed"
to "where the heck is the difference?"
- Buy once and play on all your iPhone/iPad devices!
- Direct feedback link: tell me your wishes
- No in-app purchase
- No commercials
- No additional downloads
- No Game Center
- No rubbish!

LEGO® is a registered trademark of the LEGO Group, which does not sponsor,
endorse, or authorise this app. Visit the official LEGO website at lego.com.
